action_items.text: Update the onboarding screens and share mocks
action_items.evidence: Priya: I’ll update the onboarding screens and share mocks by Friday.

action_items.text: Investigate caching strategies and provide a recommendation
action_items.evidence: Alex: Jordan, can you look into caching strategies and give us a recommendation by next Wednesday?

action_items.text: Finish the customer feedback summary and send it out
action_items.evidence: Priya: Yes, I’ll send it out by Monday.

action_items.text: Schedule a follow-up meeting once onboarding mocks are ready
action_items.evidence: Sam: I can set that up after Priya shares the mocks.
action_items.reason: No explicit date provided; depends on when mocks are shared.

decisions.text: Assign investigation of caching strategies to Jordan
decisions.evidence: Alex: Let’s assign it. Jordan, can you look into caching strategies and give us a recommendation by next Wednesday?

decisions.text: Park looping in design for the new dashboard for now
decisions.evidence: Alex: Agreed. Let’s park that for now.

follow_ups.text: Hold a follow-up meeting after onboarding mocks are ready
follow_ups.evidence: Alex: we should schedule a follow-up meeting once the onboarding mocks are ready.
